creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; three panel, four selvedge; vertical zig-zag pattern on central panel; side panels have rows of blue, green and purple diamond brocade alternating with rows of bird on the tree pattern; black band around waist.
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
